forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning tapering to showers and becoming mixed with snow for the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 43F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady accumulating snow later on. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers this evening and steady snow likely after midnight. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Thunder possible. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Thunder possible. High 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Thunder possible. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Thunder possible. Low 28F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low near -5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 22F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High -1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 30F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 24F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High -1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. High near 30F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. High 3C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. High 38F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 36F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning turning to rain in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 36F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 40F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 1C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low around 35F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
